entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Smith Airport 3:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.6°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 67 %

Dewpoint: -13.6°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
